headline: Has Halliburton’s 27.7% Rally Revealed a Hidden Value Opportunity for Investors in 2025?
summary: Curious if Halliburton is a hidden bargain or overpriced after its recent moves? Let’s break down what’s been happening and what it means for investors looking for value. After a bumpy year, Halliburton’s stock has bounced back with a 27.7% surge in the last 30 days and a solid 4.7% gain over the past week. However, it’s still down 4.4% over the last year. Recent headlines highlight optimism around the global energy outlook as oilfield service companies like Halliburton see renewed interest...
